transforms.code:
if self.view.params.row_data.row_id > -1: #Existing Incident
		#if self.view.custom.suspension_edit:
		if self.view.params.row_data.bar_participant == 1: #Existing Suspension
			return True
		else:
			return False
	else:
		return False

config.script:
#system.perspective.print("New Incident Button Pressed")
	#Send the message to refresh the table
	messageType = 'refreshIncidentDetail'
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType)

import traceback
	try:
		project = "RITI"
		### Declare parameters 
		row_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.row_id
		time_created = system.date.now()
		user_name = self.session.props.auth.user.userName
		employee_id = 0
		participant_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.participant_id
		participant_human_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.participant_human_id	
		incident_name = str(participant_id)+ "-" + str(system.date.format(system.date.now(),"yyyyMMdd"))
		incident_date = self.view.custom.edit_data.incident_date
		physical_injury = self.view.custom.edit_data.physical_injury
		property_damage = self.view.custom.edit_data.property_damage
		bar_participant = self.view.custom.edit_data.bar_participant
		incident_location = self.view.custom.edit_data.incident_location_id
		incident_description = self.view.custom.edit_data.incident_description
		#Suspension data if bar_particiapant is True
		suspension_type_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.suspension_type_id
		suspension_duration = self.view.custom.edit_data.suspension_duration
		suspension_time_begin = self.view.custom.edit_data.suspension_time_begin
		suspension_time_end = self.view.custom.edit_data.suspension_time_end
		reinstateRequired = self.view.custom.edit_data.reinstateRequired
		organization_id = 4
		suspension_notes = self.view.custom.edit_data.suspension_notes

	
		## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
		if (row_id is None):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Row ID Error"
		elif (time_created is None):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Time Created Error"
		elif (incident_date is None):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Incident Date Error"
		elif (employee_id is None) or (int(employee_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Employee ID Error"
		elif (participant_id is None):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Participant ID Error"
		elif (int(participant_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Participant ID Error"
		elif (participant_human_id is None):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Participant Human ID Error"
		elif (int(participant_human_id) < 0):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Participant Human ID Error"
		elif (physical_injury is None):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select the Physical Injury Status"
		elif (int(physical_injury) < 0):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select the Physical Injury Status"
		elif (property_damage is None):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select the Property Damage Status"
		elif (int(property_damage) < 0):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select the Property Damage Status"
		elif (bar_participant is None):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select the Suspension Status"
		elif (int(bar_participant) < 0):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please select the Suspension Status"
		elif (incident_location is None):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please enter the incident location."
		elif (int(incident_location) < 0):
			valid = False
			error_message = "Please enter the incident location."
		else:
			valid = True
			#system.perspective.print("Incident Data Valid")
		#Check only if bar_particiapnt is true
		if (bar_participant) and valid:
			if (suspension_type_id is None):
				valid = False
				error_message = "Please select the Suspension Type"
			elif (int(suspension_type_id) < 0):
				valid = False
				error_message = "Please select the Suspension Type"
			elif (suspension_time_begin is None):
				valid = False
				error_message = "Please enter the suspension begin time."
			elif (suspension_time_end is None):
				valid = False
				error_message = "Please enter the end begin time."
		### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
		if valid:
			### Check if the user is creating new data
			if row_id == -1:#Insert new data, no row_id
				#system.perspective.print("Insert New Data")
				path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailInsert"
				parameters = {"time_created":time_created, "incident_date":incident_date, 
							"employee_id":employee_id,"physical_injury":physical_injury, 
							"property_damage":property_damage, "bar_participant":bar_participant,
							"incident_name":incident_name, "incident_location":incident_location,
							"incident_description":incident_description,"participant_id":participant_id,
							"user_name":user_name}
				log_id = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)		
				#system.perspective.print("Insert data")
				#system.perspective.print(log_id)
				#Insert the participant into the Attendee Log
				type_id = 0
				human_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.participant_human_id
				path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailAttendeeInsert"
				parameters = {"log_id":log_id, "type_id":type_id,
							"human_id":human_id, "time_created":time_created}
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				#Insert the staff into the Attendee Log
				if len(self.view.custom.edit_data.staff_involved):
					for row in range(len(self.view.custom.edit_data.staff_involved)):
						type_id = 3
						human_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.staff_involved[row]
						#system.perspective.print(human_id)
						path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailAttendeeInsert"
						parameters = {"log_id":log_id, "type_id":type_id,
									"human_id":human_id, "time_created":time_created}
						Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				#Insert the incident types into the Incident Type Log
				#system.perspective.print(len(self.view.custom.edit_data.incident_type_id))
				if len(self.view.custom.edit_data.incident_type_id):
					for row in range(len(self.view.custom.edit_data.incident_type_id)):
						type_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.incident_type_id[row]
						path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailTypeInsert"
						parameters = {"log_id":log_id, "type_id":type_id,
									"time_created":time_created}
						Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				#Insert the suspension data
				if bar_participant:
					#Insert the suspension data
					path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailSuspensionInsert"
					parameters = {"time_created":time_created,"employee_id":employee_id,
								"participant_id":participant_id,"user_name":user_name,
								"organization_id":organization_id, "incident_log_id":log_id,
								"suspension_notes":suspension_notes, "suspension_type_id":suspension_type_id,
								"duration":suspension_duration,
								"dateBegin":suspension_time_begin,"dateEnd":suspension_time_end,
								"incident_location_id":incident_location,
								"reinstateRequired":reinstateRequired}
					suspension_id = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
					#Insert the default comment
					path = "Participants/Reinstatement/ReinstatementDetailInsert"
					parameters = {"participant_id":participant_id,"suspension_id":suspension_id,
								"comment":suspension_notes,
								"user_name":user_name,
								"time_created":time_created,
								"duration":suspension_duration,
								"suspension_type_id":suspension_type_id,
								"time_begin":suspension_time_begin,
								"time_end":suspension_time_end}
					comment_id = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
					#Set the suspension_active flag
					path = "Participants/Reinstatement/ReinstatementDetailSetSuspensionActive"
					parameters = {"participant_id":participant_id}
					Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
					#If Reinstatement is required then check for other suspensions,
					#set the Reinstate Required flag on all suspensions
					if reinstateRequired:
						path = "Participants/Reinstatement/SuspensionDetailSelectActive"
						parameters = {"participant_id":participant_id}
						dataset = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)
						#Get selected suspension ID's
						idlist = []
						for	i in range(dataset.getRowCount()):
							idlist.append(str(dataset.getValueAt(i, "id")))
						strIdList = ','.join(idlist)
						path = "Participants/Reinstatement/ReinstatementRequiredUpdate"
						parameters = {"IdList": strIdList}
						result = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)
			##### Check if the user is editing existing data

			elif row_id >= 0:#Update existing data on specified row_id
				#system.perspective.print("Update Exisiting Data")
				path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailUpdate"
				parameters = {"time_created":time_created, "incident_date":incident_date, 
							"employee_id":employee_id,"physical_injury":physical_injury, 
							"property_damage":property_damage, "bar_participant":bar_participant,
							"incident_name":incident_name, "incident_location":incident_location,
							"incident_description":incident_description, "row_id":row_id,
							"participant_id":participant_id,"user_name":user_name}
				log_id = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)		
				#system.perspective.print("Update Data")
				#system.perspective.print(row_id)
				#Delete and re-insert the data for the Suspension Log, Attendee Log and Type Log
				#path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailSuspensionDelete"
				#parameters = {"incident_row_id":row_id}
				#Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
				path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailAttendeeDelete"
				parameters = {"incident_row_id":row_id}
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
				path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailTypeDelete"
				parameters = {"incident_row_id":row_id}
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				#Insert the participant into the Attendee Log
				type_id = 0
				human_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.participant_human_id
				path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailAttendeeInsert"
				parameters = {"log_id":row_id, "type_id":type_id,
							"human_id":human_id, "time_created":time_created}
				Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				#Insert the staff into the Attendee Log
				if len(self.view.custom.edit_data.staff_involved):
					for row in range(len(self.view.custom.edit_data.staff_involved)):
						type_id = 3
						human_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.staff_involved[row]
						system.perspective.print(human_id)
						path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailAttendeeInsert"
						parameters = {"log_id":row_id, "type_id":type_id,
									"human_id":human_id, "time_created":time_created}
						Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				#Insert the incident types into the Incident Type Log
				#system.perspective.print(len(self.view.custom.edit_data.incident_type_id))
				if len(self.view.custom.edit_data.incident_type_id):
					for row in range(len(self.view.custom.edit_data.incident_type_id)):
						type_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.incident_type_id[row]
						path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailTypeInsert"
						parameters = {"log_id":row_id, "type_id":type_id,
									"time_created":time_created}
						Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
				#Update the suspension log
				newSuspension = self.parent.parent.getChild("EmbeddedView Row2").position.display
				if bar_participant and newSuspension:
					#Write the suspension log data if suspended
					#system.perspective.print('Suspension Update')
					path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailSuspensionInsert"
					parameters = {"time_created":time_created,"employee_id":employee_id,
								"participant_id":participant_id,"user_name":user_name,
								"organization_id":organization_id, "incident_log_id":row_id,
								"suspension_notes":suspension_notes, "suspension_type_id":suspension_type_id,
								"duration":suspension_duration,
								"dateBegin":suspension_time_begin,"dateEnd":suspension_time_end,
								"incident_location_id":incident_location,
								"reinstateRequired":reinstateRequired}
					suspension_id = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
					#Insert the default comment
					path = "Participants/Reinstatement/ReinstatementDetailInsert"
					parameters = {"participant_id":participant_id,"suspension_id":suspension_id,
								"comment":suspension_notes,
								"user_name":user_name,
								"time_created":time_created,
								"duration":suspension_duration,
								"suspension_type_id":suspension_type_id,
								"time_begin":suspension_time_begin,
								"time_end":suspension_time_end}
					comment_id = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
					#Set the suspension_active flag
					path = "Participants/Reinstatement/ReinstatementDetailSetSuspensionActive"
					parameters = {"participant_id":participant_id}
					Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
					#If Reinstatement is required then check for other suspensions,
					#set the Reinstate Required flag on all suspensions
					if reinstateRequired:
						path = "Participants/Reinstatement/SuspensionDetailSelectActive"
						parameters = {"participant_id":participant_id}
						dataset = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)
						#Get selected suspension ID's
						idlist = []
						for	i in range(dataset.getRowCount()):
							idlist.append(str(dataset.getValueAt(i, "id")))
						strIdList = ','.join(idlist)
						path = "Participants/Reinstatement/ReinstatementRequiredUpdate"
						parameters = {"IdList": strIdList}
						result = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters)
			##### Refresh the table
			#if Refresh:	
				#system.perspective.print("Incident Detail Query Success")
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage('Incident Updated Successfully')
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="RefreshIncidentsData", payload={}, scope="session")
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshIncidentDetail", payload={}, scope="session")
			system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshPersonalInformation", payload={}, scope="session")
		
		else:
			self.getSibling("Label").showMessage(error_message)
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants IncidentsDetailEdit button_save")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)	
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

### Declare parameters
	project = "RITI" 
	incident_row_id = self.view.custom.edit_data.row_id
		
	## Check if parameters are filled in correctly 
	if (incident_row_id is None) or (int(incident_row_id) < 0):
		valid = False
		system.perspective.print("Row ID Error")
	else:
		valid = True
		system.perspective.print("Data Valid")
			
	### Check if data is valid otherwise show error message.
	if valid:
		#try:
		#Delete the data for the Suspnesion Log
		path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailSuspensionDelete"
		parameters = {"incident_row_id":incident_row_id}
		Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
		#Delete the data for the Attendee Log and Type Log
		path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailAttendeeDelete"
		parameters = {"incident_row_id":incident_row_id}
		Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)	
		
		path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailTypeDelete"
		parameters = {"incident_row_id":incident_row_id}
		Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
		#Delete the incident
		path = "Participants/Incidents/IncidentDetailDelete"
		parameters = {"incident_row_id":incident_row_id}
		Refresh = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)		
		#system.perspective.print("Delete Incident")
		##### Refresh the table
		if Refresh:	
			system.perspective.print("Incident Detail Delete Query Success")
		system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="RefreshIncidentsData", payload={}, scope="session")
			
		#except:
		#	self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")	
	else:
		self.getSibling("Label").showMessage("Something went wrong while saving data. Please try again.")

customMethods.name: showMessage
customMethods.script:
import time
	self.props.text = message
	self.meta.visible = True
	time.sleep(3)
	self.meta.visible = False
